actionfx-core

All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary Annotation Types Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractActionFXBeanContainer
    Abstract base class for ActionFX' bean container implementation providing some basic bean handling code for ActionFX.
    AbstractAFXApplication
    Base class for ActionFX applications that can be optionally used.
    AbstractAnnotatedFieldBeansExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Beans extension base class that extends annotated fields.
    AbstractAnnotatedFieldControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Controller extension base class that extends annotated fields.
    AbstractAnnotatedMethodBeansExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Beans extension base class that extends annotated methods.
    AbstractAnnotatedMethodControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Controller extension base class that extends annotated methods.
    AbstractAnnotatedMethodControllerExtension.OrderBasedAnnotatedMethodComparator<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Comparator implementation that orders methods according to the "order" attribute among same controls.
    AbstractAnnotationBasedBeansExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,​E extends java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement>
    Base class for beans extensions that apply a logic to controller fields and methods that are marked with annotations.
    AbstractAnnotationBasedControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,​E extends java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement>
    Base class for controller extensions that apply a logic to controller fields and methods that are marked with annotations.
    AbstractAnnotationBasedExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,​E extends java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement>
    Base class for extensions that apply a logic to fields and methods that are marked with annotations.
    AbstractBinding<S,​T>
    Abstract base class for different binding implementations.
    AbstractBindingView
    Abstract base class for an ActionFX view implementations that support a binding of a model class to JavaFX controls.
    AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver
    Abstract base class of a BindingTargetResolver implementation that supports an internal caching.
    AbstractDateConverter<S,​T>
    Base class for converters that convert a Date.
    AbstractFloatingPointConverter<S,​T>
    Base class for converters that convert a floating point number like Float or Double.
    AbstractInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Base class for specialized Supplier implementation that take care of the instantiation of an ActionFX component (controller, view, etc.).
    AbstractJavaTimeConverter<S,​T>
    Base class for converters that convert a java.time.* type.
    AbstractNodeActivationControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Abstract base class for controller field extension that manipulates the node state via the Node.disabledProperty() depending on controls in the JavaFX scene graph.
    AbstractRequiredValidator
    Abstract base class for Validator implementations that need to ensure that a required value is provided, before the actual validation can take place.
    AbstractTimedChangeListener
    Abstract base class for change listener implementation that do potentially support a delay in the invocation of a wrapped change listener.
    AbstractValidatingView
    Abstract base class for an ActionFX view implementations.
    AbstractValidationControllerExtension<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Base class for controller extensions performing a validation.
    AbstractValidationDecoration
    Implements common functionality for validation decorators.
    AbstractView
    Abstract base class for an ActionFX view implementations.
    ActionFX
    Central handler for working with ActionFX.
    ActionFX.ActionFXBuilder
    Builder for setting up the singleton instance of ActionFX.
    ActionFX.ActionFXState
    Enumeration describing the state of ActionFX.
    ActionFXByteBuddyEnhancer
    Byte-code enhancer using the ByteBuddy framework.
    ActionFXByteBuddyEnhancer.AFXActionMethodInterceptorDelegator
    Interceptor implementation for handling method invocation of methods annotated with the AFXShowView annotation.
    ActionFXEnhancer
    Interface for byte code enhancer.
    ActionFXEnhancer.EnhancementStrategy
    Defines available enhancement strategies for ActionFX.
    ActionFXExtensionsBean
    Bean that carries all custom controller extensions added by the user during ActionFX startup.
    ActionFXMethodInvocation
    Convenience class for calling a method that can contain ActionFX annotations (like AFXRequiresUserConfirmation or method argument annotations like AFXControlValue.
    AFXActionMethodInterceptor
    Interceptor implementation for handling method invocation of methods annotated with the AFXShowView annotation.
    AFXApplication
    Annotation that can be applied to the main class of an ActionFX application for configuring it.
    AFXArgHint
    Annotation to apply "hints" to method arguments.
    AFXCellValueConfig
    Annotation that can be applied at field level to configure tables/table columns and what data shall be displayed there and how.
    AFXCellValueConfig.AFXTableColumns
    Annotation to make AFXCellValueConfig repeatable (e.g.
    AFXController
    Annotation for ActionFX controllers to associate and manage a view together with it.
    AFXControlValue
    Annotation to be applied to method arguments to retrieve the user value from the specified control.
    AFXConverter
    Annotation that can be applied at field level to add a converter to a control.
    AFXDisableNode
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Node for defining, when this node shall be disabled (and when enabled).
    AFXEnableMultiSelection
    Annotation that can be applied at field level on a Control, in order to enable a multi-selection on that annotated control.
    AFXEnableNode
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Node for defining, when this node shall be enabled (and when disabled).
    AFXFormBinding
    Annotation that can be applied at field level on an ObjectProperty, which holds a model object that will be bound to controls inside the view.
    AFXFormMapping
    Repeatable annotation that can be applied at field level on a ObjectProperty additionally to a AFXFormBinding annotation to explicitly map a field in a model class to a control name.
    AFXFormMapping.AFXFormMappings
    Annotation to make AFXFormMapping repeatable.
    AFXFromDirectoryChooserDialog
    Method argument annotation which request the value of the annotated argument of type File, String, Path or URI from a "directory chooser" dialog.
    AFXFromFileOpenDialog
    Method argument annotation which request the value of the annotated argument of type File, String, Path or URI from a "file open" dialog.
    AFXFromFileSaveDialog
    Method argument annotation which request the value of the annotated argument of type File, String, Path or URI from a "file save" dialog.
    AFXFromTextInputDialog
    Method argument annotation for requesting a text input of type String from a "text input" dialog.
    AFXLoadControlData
    Annotated methods are returning the data that is displayed in referenced Controls.
    AFXNestedView
    Repeatable annotation to define a nested view.
    AFXNestedView.AFXNestedViews
    Annotation to make AFXNestedView repeatable.
    AFXOnAction
    Annotated methods are invoked when the node or control specified with fires ActionEvent.
    AFXOnControlValueChange
    Annotated methods are invoked when the user changes a value in the referenced control identified by AFXOnControlValueChange.controlId().
    AFXRequiresUserConfirmation
    Annotated methods are only executed, when the user confirms the execution via a confirmation dialog.
    AFXShowView
    Annotation to be applied at method level that allows to define which view to be displayed after successful method invocation.
    AFXSubscribe
    Allows a simple event mechanism and a loose couple of ActionFX controllers.
    AFXUseFilteredList
    Annotation that can be applied at field level on a Control, so that ActionFX instructs the control to use a FilteredList as items.
    AFXUtils
    Util-class for working with JavaFX.
    AFXValidateBoolean
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that has been entered inside the annotated control and that is expected to have a certain boolean value.
    AFXValidateBoolean.AFXValidateBooleans
    Annotation to make AFXValidateBoolean repeatable.
    AFXValidateCustom
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that has been entered inside the annotated control.
    AFXValidateCustom.AFXValidateCustoms
    Annotation to make AFXValidateCustom repeatable.
    AFXValidateMinMax
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that has been entered inside the annotated control and its value has to be between a minimum and a maximum value (inclusively).
    AFXValidateMinMax.AFXValidateMinMaxs
    Annotation to make AFXValidateMinMax repeatable.
    AFXValidateRegExp
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that needs to match a specified regular expression.
    AFXValidateRegExp.AFXValidateRegExps
    Annotation to make AFXValidateRegExp repeatable.
    AFXValidateRequired
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that has been entered inside the annotated control and that is required for passing validation.
    AFXValidateRequired.AFXValidateRequireds
    Annotation to make AFXValidateRequired repeatable.
    AFXValidateSize
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that has been entered inside the annotated control and its value has to be of a certain size.
    AFXValidateSize.AFXValidateSizes
    Annotation to make AFXValidateSize repeatable.
    AFXValidateTemporal
    Field annotation that can be applied to a Control for validating user input that has been entered inside the annotated control and is expected to represent a temporal value (e.g.
    AFXValidateTemporal.AFXValidateTemporals
    Annotation to make AFXValidateTemporal repeatable.
    AnnotatedParameterResolver<A extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Interface for resolving a method parameter having an annotation to a value.
    AnnotationUtils
    Utils class for working with annotations.
    ArgumentHint
    A hint for a method parameter that can help in case two different method parameters have the same type.
    AsyncUtils
    Utils for performing tasks in an asynchronous fashion.
    BeanContainerFacade
    Facade for accessing a bean container holding necessary view and controller instances.
    BeanDefinitionPostProcessor
    Post-processor for bean definitions after these are added to the bean container.
    BeanExtension
    Bean registration callbacks are invoked right after a new bean definition is added to the used bean container.
    BeanProperty<T>
    A specific property inside a Java bean.
    BeanPropertyReference<T>
    A reference to a Java bean property and its value;
    BeanWrapper
    Wrapper around a JavaBean to access its properties via convenience methods.
    BidirectionalConverter<S,​T>
    A converter converts a source object of type S to a target of type T and vice versa.
    Binding
    Interface for different type of bindings.
    BindingModelProxy
    Proxy around a model class that is used for form binding.
    BindingTarget
    Describes a desired binding between a Control and a value inside a JavaBean.
    BindingTargetResolver
    Interface for resolving a field into a control that acts as a binding target.
    BindingType
    Describes the internal binding type that will be established.
    BooleanBindingBuilder
    Builder class for creating a BooleanBinding for one or many Controls or Observables.
    BooleanBindingBuilder.MatchingOp
    Enum describes whether a predicate must match all testables or at least one testable.
    BooleanBindingBuilder.PredicateBuilder<T>
    Builder class for creating a single predicate meant to be addded to a larger predicate chain.
    BooleanBindingBuilder.PredicateElement<T>
    Represents a single predicate that can be chained together with other predicates.
    BooleanOp
    Describes a Boolean operation.
    BooleanValidator
    Validator implementation that checks whether the control's value is an expected boolean value, true or false.
    BooleanValue
    Enumeration representing a boolean value that can be used in an annotation, so that beside the values for true and false an "undefined" state is possible.
    BorderPanePosition
    Describes the position in a BorderPane.
    CellValueConfigControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXCellValueConfig annotation.
    ClassPathScanningUtils
    Utils for scanning the classpath.
    CompoundValidationDecoration
    Validation decoration to combine several existing decorations into one.
    ConstructorBasedInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Instantiation supplier that uses defined constructors of given class.
    ControllerInstancePostProcessor
    Post-processor for controller instances that is invoked after view creation and dependency injection, but before potential @PostConstruct-annotated methods.
    ControllerInstantiationSupplier<T>
    Instantiation supplier for controller instances.
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter
    Adapter for invoking controller methods with variable method arguments.
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter.MethodExecutionState
    State that describes whether the method is executed or not, or maybe whether even the execution shall be cancelled.
    ControllerMethodInvocationAdapter.ParameterValue
    A representation of a method parameter, together with a ArgumentHint
    ControllerWrapper<T>
    Wrapper class around a JavaFX controller that is enhanced either with an instrumentation agent or via sub-classing.
    ControlProperties
    Enumeration for addressing properties inside a Control in a more general fashion.
    ControlValueAnnotatedParameterResolver
    Implementation of AnnotatedParameterResolver that uses annotation AFXControlValue to resolve the parameter argument by taking the value from the control specified in AFXControlValue.
    ControlWrapper
    Wrapper around a Control in order to have a unique access to its values.
    ConversionService
    Service offering conversion routines.
    ConversionService.ConverterFactory<S,​T>
    Factory interface for creating instances of converter.
    ConversionService.ConvertiblePair
    A pair of source and target type, used as key for hashmap lookup.
    Converter<S,​T>
    A converter converts a source object of type S to a target of type T.
    ConverterControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXConverter annotation.
    CustomMethodValidator
    Validator implementation that forwards the validation to a method inside an ActionFX controller returning a ValidationResult value.
    DateToJavaTimeConverter<T extends java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor>
    Converts a Date to a Java time TemporalAccessor.
    DateToStringConverter
    Converts a Date to a String.
    Decoration
    Class for ActionFX scenegraph decorations.
    DecorationPane
    A DecorationPane is an overlay over an existing scenegraph that can accept decorations on controls inside the overlaid scenegraph.
    DecorationUtils
    This util class helps to add or remove decorations to nodes in the JavaFX scenegraph.
    DefaultActionFXBeanContainer
    Default implementation of a bean container using an underlying hash map as bean cache.
    DialogController
    Controller for working with simple dialogs like confirmation-, information-, warning-, error-, file handling- and text input dialogs.
    DisableNodeControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that disables nodes of the JavaFX scene graph depending on control values.
    DoubleToStringConverter
    Converts a Double to a String.
    EnableMultiSelectionControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXNestedView annotation.
    EnableNodeControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that enables nodes of the JavaFX scene graph depending on control values.
    ExceptionUtils
    Utils for working with exceptions in ActionFX.
    FileToPathConverter
    Converts a File to a Path.
    FileToStringConverter
    Converts a File to a URI by using the absolute path of the file
    FileToURIConverter
    Converts a File to a URI.
    FloatToStringConverter
    Converts a Float to a String.
    FormBindingControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for binding a value inside an annotated field of type ObjectProperty to the conrols of the view.
    FromDirectoryChooserDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "directory chooser" dialog.
    FromFileOpenDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "file open" dialog.
    FromFileSaveDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "file save" dialog.
    FromTextInputDialogParameterResolver
    Parameter resolver implementation that resolves a method argument by taking its value from a "text input" dialog.
    FxmlView
    View implementation that uses FXML for describing the view.
    GenericBidirectionalConverter<S,​T>
    BidirectionalConverter that is able to use 2 Converter to perform to-/from conversion from and to the desired data type.
    GenericStringConverter<T>
    StringConverter that is able to use 2 Converter to perform to-/from-string conversion.
    GraphicDecoration
    GraphicDecoration is a Decoration designed to show a graphic (be it an image loaded via an ImageView or an arbitrarily complex scenegraph in its own right) on top of a given node.
    GraphicValidationDecoration
    Validation decorator to decorate validation state using images.
    JavaTimeToDateConverter
    Converts a Java time TemporalAccessor to a Date.
    JavaTimeToJavaTimeConverter<S extends java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor,​T extends java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor>
    Converts a java.time to another java.time instance.
    JavaTimeToStringConverter
    Converts a java.time.* to a String.
    MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver
    Implementation of a BindingTargetResolver that uses an internal mapping for field names (also nested fields are supported) to control IDs for resolving to a control.
    MessageUtils
    Util class for handlung internationalized messages.
    MinMaxValidator
    Validator implementation that checks whether the control's value is between a min- and a max-value (inclusively).
    NameBasedBindindTargetResolver
    Implementation of a BindingTargetResolver that looks for controls whose ID is starting with the field name to resolve.
    NestedExpression
    Represents a property path expression that can be nested or not.
    NestedThrowableException
    Wrapper class for transporting a Throwable as RuntimeException.
    NestedViewControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXNestedView annotation.
    NodeVisitor
    Functional handler for applying some logic during scene graph traversal.
    NodeWrapper
    Wrapper around a Node (or other objects inside a scene graph, e.g.
    NodeWrapper.AnchorPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node inside an AnchorPane.
    NodeWrapper.BorderPaneAttacher
    Attacher that positions a node in a BorderPane.
    NodeWrapper.ColRowAttacher
    Specialized attacher for GridPane nodes, where the node can be attached at a specified column and row.
    NodeWrapper.DefaultAttacher
    Simple attacher that supports single child wrapper like ScrollPane (and its content property) as well as node derived from Parent.
    NodeWrapper.ListAttacher
    Attaches a node to a list at a specified position.
    NodeWrapper.ListFirstAttacher
    Attaches a node as first element to a list.
    NodeWrapper.ListLastAttacher
    Attaches a node as last element to a list.
    NodeWrapper.NodeAttacher
    Interface for attaching a node to the node wrapper's children at a specified position.
    NumberToNumberConverter<S extends java.lang.Number,​T extends java.lang.Number>
    Converts a number to a number.
    ObjectToStringConverter
    Converter that simple calls Object.toString() to convert a source Object to a String.
    ObservableListAdapter<E>
    Adapter class for populating values in an ObservableList.
    ObservableListBinding<E>
    Binding implementation that binds a target ObservableList to a source List.
    ObservableListSelectionModel<T>
    Wrapper for an ObservableList to access the items of this list as a SelectionModel.
    ObservableValueBinding<S,​E>
    Binding implementation that binds an ObservableValue to another BeanPropertyReference.
    OnActionMethodControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXOnAction annotation.
    OnControlValueChangeMethodControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXOnControlValueChange annotation.
    OnLoadControlDataMethodControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXLoadControlData annotation.
    ParentView
    View implementation that is based on a class derived from Parent.
    PathToFileConverter
    Converts a Path to a File.
    PathToStringConverter
    Converts a Path to a String.
    PathToURIConverter
    Converts a Path to a URI.
    PriorityAwareEventBus
    Basic interface of an event bus that allows a publish/subscribe with defining a priority on the subscribers.
    ReflectionUtils
    Utils for handling reflections.
    ReflectionUtils.FieldFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter fields to be operated on by a field callback.
    ReflectionUtils.MethodFilter
    Callback optionally used to filter methods to be operated on by a method callback.
    RegExpValidator
    Validator implementation that
    RequiredValidator
    Validator implementation that checks, whether a required field has a value.
    SimplePriorityAwareEventBus
    Straight forward implementation of the PriorityAwareEventBus implementation that considers a priority assigned to a registered subscriber, when publishing an event to its subscriber.
    SingleExpression
    Represent a single property path expression e.g.
    SizeValidator
    Validator implementation that checks whether the control's value size is between a min- and a max-value (inclusively).
    StringToBooleanConverter
    Converts a String into a Boolean.
    StringToDateConverter
    Converts a String to a Date.
    StringToDoubleConverter
    Converts a String to a Double.
    StringToEnumConverter<T extends java.lang.Enum<T>>
    Converts a String into a Enum.
    StringToFileConverter
    Converts a String to a File.
    StringToFloatConverter
    Converts a String to a Float.
    StringToJavaTimeConverter<T extends java.time.temporal.TemporalAccessor>
    Converts a String to a java.time.* type.
    StringToNumberConverter<T extends java.lang.Number>
    Converts a string to a JDK supported number.
    StringToObjectConverter<T>
    Fallback converter for converting a string into an object, in case no other, more specific converter is available.
    StringToPathConverter
    Converts a String to a Path.
    StringToURIConverter
    Converts a String to a URI.
    StyleClassDecoration
    StyleClassDecoration is a Decoration designed to add a CSS style class to a node (for example, to show a warning style when the field is incorrectly set).
    StyleClassValidationDecoration
    Validation decorator to decorate component validation state using two CSS classes for errors and warnings.
    SubscribeMethodBeanExtension
    Extends beans for methods annotated by AFXSubscribe, which allows a simple publish/subscribe pattern and a loose coupling of ActionFX controllers.
    TemporalValidator
    Validator implementation that validates a date / time value.
    TimedArrayChangeListener<T extends javafx.collections.ObservableArray<T>>
    Implementation of the ArrayChangeListener interface that schedules a delayed action after the event occurs.
    TimedChangeListener<T>
    Implementation of the ChangeListener interface that schedules a delayed action after the event occurs.
    TimedListChangeListener<T>
    Implementation of the ListChangeListener interface that schedules a delayed action after the event occurs.
    TimedMapChangeListener<K,​V>
    Implementation of the MapChangeListener interface that schedules a delayed action after the event occurs.
    TimedSetChangeListener<T>
    Implementation of the SetChangeListener interface that schedules a delayed action after the event occurs.
    URIToFileConverter
    Converts a URI to a File.
    URIToPathConverter
    Converts a URI to a Path.
    URIToStringConverter
    Converts a URI to a String.
    UseFilteredListControllerExtension
    Extends controllers for functionality for AFXUseFilteredList annotation.
    ValidateBooleanControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that applies validation on it using a custom method inside the annotated ActionFX controller.
    ValidateCustomControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that applies validation on it using a custom method inside the annotated ActionFX controller.
    ValidateMinMaxControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that applies validation on it using a min/max validator on a control's value.
    ValidateRegExpControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that applies validation on it using a regular expression on the control's value.
    ValidateRequiredControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that applies validation on it using a required field validator.
    ValidateSizeControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that applies validation on it using a size validator on the control's value.
    ValidateTemporalControllerExtension
    Controller field extension that applies validation on it using a temporal validator on the control's value.
    ValidationDecoration
    Contract for validation decorators.
    ValidationHelper
    Useful values for working with validation annotations.
    ValidationMessage
    Internal implementation of simple validation message
    ValidationMessage.ValidationMessageComparator
    Comparator for sorting validation messages according to their severity.
    ValidationMode
    Defines the validation mode of controls, used in various validation-related annotations.
    ValidationOptions
    Configuration object for a single control and value validation.
    ValidationResult
    Represents the result of a performed validation.
    ValidationStatus
    Defines severity of validation messages.
    Validator
    Base interface for validations in ActionFX.
    ValueChangeAwareObservableList<E>
    Special implementation of ObservableList that is aware when values of list elements are changing.
    ValueChangeAwareObservableList.SingleValueChange<E>
    Implementation of ListChangeListener.Change that represents a "list change", when values of the list are updated.
    View
    Interface for ActionFX views.
    ViewBuilder<T extends AbstractView>
    Builder for setting up instances derived from AbstractView.
